issue.title: macOS Ventura 13.0 sync fails due to com.apple.provenance metadata

repository.name: syncthing-macos
repository.description: Official frugal and native macOS Syncthing application bundle

issue.body:
**update:** This should be fixed once v1.22.2 is released, scroll down for details...
---
Since upgrading one of my Macs to Ventura 13.0, my folder will no longer sync (getting stuck on a piece of undocumented metadata called `com.apple.provenance`

I have tried removing the xattr with `sudo xattr -d com.apple.provenance /path/to/file` but that isn't working either.

Google has nothing about this really... anyone else running into this? Using syncthing-macos 1.22.0-1

_see [related post on ST forum](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/com-apple-provenance/19262)_

issue.title: lib/model: Correctly handle xattrs on directories (fixes #8657)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body: I'd forgotten to add code to set xattrs to the directory handling paths. To fix that and avoid similar mistakes in the future I moved the xattr handling to a new adjustCommonMetadata function, which previously just handled ownership. The idea is for this function to apply common things to all file types, so we can add things in one place and not forget half of them...

issue.title: Fails to sync file with changes to data + xattrs

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

issue.body:
- v1.22.2-rc.1
 - macOS 13.0.1

I compiled a custom build for macOS to work around #8657, which is definitely making progress. But I think there may be a side effect or regression now, because although I can get my 2 machines to agree when they are 100% synced, I am now facing a new issue: changes on Mac-A are not fully propagating to Mac-B.

Syncthing is copying the file over to the right place, and naming it `.syncthing.foo.tmp` but the rename never happens, so I'm now getting **Out of Sync** errors. I enabled some additional Debug Facilities on Mac-B (`app`, `fs`, `main`, `walkfs` and `watchaggregator`) and here's what I'm seeing:
